extendedInfo.description: It's time to change to the best Flashlight - MEGA FlashlightDo you know why?Because the collecting of your personal information from the other flashlight apps is too damn high.====================================Some information to all review writers about the hardware controls and network permission:1. Network permission is only for third party advertisements. That's the reason, why our App is Free.2. The Permission "Hardware controls". We need the camera permission to open / close the LED Flash. Please, when somebody wants to write a review about that a flashlight app doesn't needs a camera permission, then please research first. Please search for some android flashlight examples on the Internet and you will see that all the flashlight apps are using the camera permission. It's called camera, because the LED Flash is linked with the camera. And if you still do not believe us, just ask the Android developers. 3. If the app does not work, then please don't write a bad review. Please send us an email to the email address given below. Customer feedback to improve the quality of our service.Thank You!====================================Now use your smartphone as a flashlight.INFO: We have come to know that some annoy their teacher in the classroom with MEGA Flashlight app. Please don't do that.Thanks for download. Stay loyal to us and recommend us to others.FEATURES:â Screen Lightâ Morse Codeâ Strobe Lightâ Police Lightsâ Warning Lightâ Battery Statusâ The Best Supportâ Switch Button: to switch between "Flashlight Mode" or "NO Flashlight Mode".NO FLASHLIGHT MODE: This feature is using your phone's screen as a light source- Use it, if your device has no LED Flash- Use it, if your LED Flash on your device does not work - Use it, if you wanna show Morse Code or Strobe Light on your phone's screenINFORMATION PERMISSIONS:MEGA Flashlight DOES NOT need the following permissions like all other flashlight appsâ  NO Phone Callsâ  NO System Toolsâ  NO GPS Locationâ  NO read and write of your personal informationâ  NO SyncPERMISSION: Network communicationMEGA Flashlight contains third party advertisements.PERMISSION: Hardware controls:Permission is required to open / close the Flashlight.CAUTION: A very small percentage of individuals may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to certain light patterns or flashing lights.SUPPORT:Suggestions for improvements and feature requests? Mail to: megaflashlight@ruddyrooster.comWe are looking forward to your feedback! When contacting our support team, please provide details on the type of device and Android OS version used as well as a detailed description of the issue. Thank you!CUSTOMER REVIEWS:âIt is what it says that it is-A flashlight.â by Cliff W.âreally works on my s3 crap :Dâ by Steven H.âBrightest android flashlight app.â by Tommy D. reviews.title: i love it!
reviews.comment: the best flashlight app, nothing wrong with it, ive tried them all and if u need a bright flashlight DOWNLOAD IT NOW! it downlods fast its exactly like the description :-D this is a higly recommended app by me :-D:-D:-D <3 <3 <3 <3

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: An excellent app, well worth having.  The spot light is brill. The other light features are cool too!

reviews.title: One of the best light app
reviews.comment: This is one of the best light apps the I have found. It shines bright.

reviews.title: Simple use
reviews.comment: Easy & simple to use. The flashlight is bright. The best app I\'ve downloaded so far!

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: It would come in handy and great for a flash light. Would be good for camping.
reviews.author: Marquita Wilhite

reviews.comment: Fantastic app.i love the extra collection of emergency lights  including red and blue flashing warning lights that make this a must have app.its  worth getting.\tA truly fantastic app.includes several emergency flashing lights including amber.red and blue flashing lights.a strobe for sos.and the main feature a very power full torch.well worth having.
reviews.author: Kenny Mason

reviews.title: VM chaser user
reviews.comment: Good app.phone has no photo LED, but screen gives strong light. Morse is programable!Much better then nothing.
reviews.author: david dogantzis

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: If you could leave it on while answering calls our texts, I would give it 5 stars. I mainly user it while walking my dog at night.

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this flash light every where...it\'s awesome does exactly what it says it will. Ilove it, its way worth more than 5 stars

reviews.title: Second to none!
reviews.comment: So far, the superior! Second to none flash light for smart phones! Good job! Keep it up!

reviews.title: Simple and elegant
reviews.comment: This is a great app.  Not too showy. It has some cool features, and is simple to use.  Thanks.

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Works as it should. Not too many permissions for app thats the main reason for choosing. Other flashlight apps want full access location etc why? Nah, good app does the job.

reviews.comment: Really excellent and torch very useful for the sing or darkness time.

reviews.comment: I don\'t think I have come across something so helpful as this. Brilliant for safety.\tGreat

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Love the morse code one.  Nice collection of different lights.  A flash speed control would be a nice addition.  The strobelight is pretty rubbish too but the rest are okay. Nice 1

reviews.comment: I love this app it fun and I really love the police lights they are fun when you have a slow driver in front of you tge only thing is that the warning light isn\'t very bright but apart from that I love it

reviews.title: Great light, generates many laughs also
reviews.comment: Flashlight that really shines bright! Cool police light feature that\'s always fun to turn on when your riding in a car at night. The look on all your buddies faces will be hilarious as they think there being stopped !

reviews.comment: Very easy to use. Very bright . Will use in emergency and power failures.\tGave off a bright light to veg around will be useful for emergencies and outages.
